name: Super Mega Robot Jetpack Murder Simulator <Turbo>
name_original: Super Mega Robot Jetpack Murder Simulator <Turbo>
description:
In Super Mega Robot Jetpack Murder Simulator (スーパーメガロボットジェットパック殺人シミュレーターターボ) you pilot a military robot gone rogue, battling its former creators.

Over time your energy meter runs out and various functions of your robot will stop working. But defeat enemies and you'll regain some of that lost energy!
Be quick to pick it up though, it doesn't stay around forever.

Controls:
WASD - move/jump/duck/fast-fall
SPACE - grenades
SHIFT - turret
PLUS/MINUS - resize the window (mainly useful if you have a high-res screen)

Tip: jumping on smaller enemies also kills them.

This game was made in 48 hours for the 2020 GMTK Game Jam.

NOTE: If the game does not start due to missing .dll files, message me on Discord, I have a fixed version that is otherwise identical to the jam version. (@Cameron#7818 on Discord.)
